projects.name: Vue Projects Collection
projects.description: This project is a collection of small applications which where built using Vue.js with the sole purpose of learning Vue and other technologies.

projects.name: Portfolio
projects.description: This is the page you are currently on. Its purpose is twofold. The first is to showcase what I have built. The second is to simply have a larger vue project to increase my vue skills.

projects.name: CS50W - Ticket System
projects.description: This ticket system was created as the last assignment of the course 'CS50's Web Programming with Python and JavaScript' by HarvardX. The task was to create a Website that uses what has been learned during the course and should exceed the previous tasks.

projects.name: SpaceX
projects.description: The main purpose of this project was to have a project that highlights the usage of APIs.
